short_description: The Load Cell maximum measures force: 1kg (2.2lb)
You need to connect load cell with HX711 module like this, Red to E+, Black to E-, Green to A+, White to A-
Load Cell: 4 leads, easy to use, plus 5-10V drive voltage, direct output as a voltage signal due to force changes. Compatible with arduino and raspberry pi

This HX711 module uses 24 high precision A/D converter chip hx711. It is a specially designed for the high precision electronic scale designwith two analog input channelthe internal integration of 128 times the programmable gain amplifier

product_description: 1kg Load Cell: 1. 4 leads, easy to use, plus 5-10V drive voltage, direct output as a voltage signal due to force changes. Compatible with arduino and raspberry pi. 2. One end of the sensor is fixed by the screw hole, the other end is kept in a floating state, and the gravity is applied in the direction indicated by the label. 3. Special attention must be paid not to directly press the white rubber part to avoid damage to the sensor. Connection: Red to E+ Black to E- Green to A+ White to A- HX711 AD Weight Module 1. The module uses 24 high-precision A/D converter chip hx711, is designed for high-precision electronic scale and design, with two analog input channels, the internal programmable gain amplifier integrated multiplier 128. 2. The input circuit can be configured to provide a bridge voltage electrical bridge (such as pressure, weight) sensor model is an ideal high-precision, low-cost sampling front-end module. 3. Operation supply voltage range: 2.6 - 5.5V, Operating Temperature Range:-20 degree to +85 degree. 4. Simple digital control and serial interface: pin-driven controlsno programming needed. 5. Selectable 10SPS or 80SPS output data rate, Simultaneous 50 and 60Hz supply rejection. 6. Current consumption including on-chip analog power supply regulator: normal operation <1.5mApower down <1uA. HX711 Features: Two selectable differential input channels On-chip active low noise PGA with selectable gain of 3264 and 128 On-chip power supply regulator for load-cell and ADC analog power supply On-chip oscillator requiring no external component with optional external crystal On-chip power-on-reset Package Included: 4 X 1kg Load Cell Weight Sensor 4 X HX711 AD Module

name: LP7515 Weighing Scale Load Cell Indicator Bright LCD Display Digital Read Out for Old Small 4-Prong Male Connection OP-902 RS232 LB/OZ/KG
short_description: Versatile Compatibility: Ideal replacement for OP-902/LP7515 weight indicators. Features a 4-prong male connection and RS232 port, suitable for various industrial and commercial applications with multiple scale units.
Dual Power Options: Runs on AA batteries (not included) or the provided AC adapter, offering flexibility for different usage scenarios and ensuring continuous operation.
Advanced Weighing Functions: Equipped with Gross, Tare, and Zero functions, plus a Hold feature to lock weight readings. Supports multiple weighing units like lb, oz, and kg for precise measurements.
Energy-Efficient Design: Low-power consumption extends battery life. Includes an idle mode and automatic power-off function, along with low-battery detection and warning for added convenience.

User-Friendly Features: Boasts a 6-digit, 0.7” tall backlit LCD display for easy reading. Splash-proof keyboard and display enhance durability. Comes with a stainless steel wall-mount bracket and instructions for simple setup.
product_description: Description This digital indicator is suitable for various applications and scale units. It is equipped with a 4-prong male connection, and an RS-232 port located at the back of the indicator. It serves as a replacement for OP-902/LP7515 weight indicators. The connector and AC adapter are included. Features - Smooth-shaped indicator with a high-performance, stable PCB board, ideal for industrial or commercial use. - Power options: can be powered by AA batteries (not included) or the AC adapter (included). - Multiple weighing units: lb, oz, kg. - Functions: Gross, Tare, Zero. - Low-power design for extended battery life. - Hold function to lock weight readings. - Idle mode and automatic power-off function. - Low-battery detection and warning. - 6-digit, 0.7” tall LCD display with backlight. - Splash-proof keyboard and display. - RS232 Output. - Stainless steel wall-mount bracket included. - Calibration instructions included.
